game_description: Cirkle VR funny goofy game based off GTAG play with friends or something i dont know abuse the several bugs that exist be cirkle circular boy
review_1: Every time I try to play it just keeps kicking me out just why?
review_3: So whenever I play the game, I usually walk around for a little bit and then I get kicked out and then I try rejoining and then it’s really buggy and then when I do end up getting kicked out again I just keep trying to re-join and it gets even worse so please just fix it ￼
review_4: Every time I open this game it keeps kicking me out as soon as I join a lobby
review_5: It’s good because it comes with free mods but at the same time every time you use them you instantly get kicked out,so please fix this.
